translation.en: Hello?
- Turn him over. - Is he alive?
Can you hear me?
Hey.
Hey. Where are you? I've been calling for an hour.
translation.es: ¿Dónde estás? Hace una hora que te llamo.

translation.en: Lorna, you're not my wife anymore.
translation.es: Lorna, ya no eres mi esposa.

translation.en: Thanks for that, Mick,
I still get confused. Some days, I think I am your wife.
translation.es: Aún me confundo y pienso que soy tu esposa.

translation.en: Others, I'm more like your mother.
Don't do that. Think I can't tell when you're holding the phone away?
translation.es: No hagas eso. Sé cuando alejas el teléfono.

translation.en: What I am is a person who runs this practice,
translation.es: Soy la persona que dirige esta oficina,

translation.en: what's left of it anyway,
translation.es: o lo que queda de ella,

translation.en: and as such, I need to be able to reach you.
translation.es: y como tal, debo poder ubicarte.

translation.en: Okay, you reached me. What's the problem?
We got a call from Judge Holder.
- She wants to meet with you ASAP. - The Chief Judge?
Technically, the presiding judge. Tell me you're not sleeping with her.
translation.es: Se dice jueza presidenta. Dime que no te acuestas con ella.

translation.en: No. Why would you even say that?
The only reason you'd be called to the private chambers of a female judge
translation.es: Las únicas razones por las que una jueza querría verte en privado

translation.en: is, A, you have a case before her, or B, you have a personal relationship.
translation.es: son A, tienes un caso o B, tienes una relación personal.

translation.en: And since you haven't had any cases for a year…
translation.es: Y hace un año que no llevas ningún caso.

translation.en: I never even met the woman.
- She wants to meet with you now. - But she didn't say what it was about?
translation.es: - Quiere verte ahora. - Pero ¿no dijo de qué se trataba?

translation.en: No. But can we please allow for the possibility
this might be positive?
Maybe she wants to assign you a case pro bono.
translation.es: Quizás quiere darte un caso ad honorem.

translation.en: - Work begets work. - Well, maybe.
Mick?
Still here.
Drive one of the Lincolns.
They're in storage.
Get one out of storage. The Lincoln becomes you.
translation.es: Saca uno. El Lincoln te queda bien.

translation.en: And you become you.
Should this present as a real opportunity, you gotta go in there full Mickey Haller.
translation.es: Si es una oportunidad de verdad, tienes que ser tu mejor versión.

translation.en: All right.
Hey!
Hey.
You've got Hayley tonight. Just calling to remind.
translation.es: Esta noche tienes a Hayley. Te lo recuerdo.

translation.en: 'Cause you think I'll forget?
Six o'clock, okay? Not 6:10. Not 6:05.
translation.es: A las 6:00, ¿de acuerdo? No a las 6:10 ni a las 6:05.

translation.en: Who's the lucky guy? Do I know him?
6:00 p.m. sharp, Mickey.
I got it.
Hey, what can you tell me about Judge Mary Holder?
translation.es: ¿Qué sabes de la jueza Mary Holder?

translation.en: Why?
I don't know. She called me to her chambers.
translation.es: No sé. Me llamó a su despacho.

translation.en: - Did you do something? - No, I haven't done something.
Then why would she call you to chambers?
I don't know, which is why I'm asking. What can you tell me about her?
translation.es: No sé, por eso pregunto. ¿Qué sabes de ella?

translation.en: She's got a bug up her ass the size of the legal canon of ethics,
translation.es: Es una estirada con gran sentido de la ética,

translation.en: which makes me think you've done something.
translation.es: por lo que pienso que hiciste algo.

translation.en: - Thanks. - Wait, Mickey--
I'll see you tonight.
He's done something.
Oh, hello, Mick.
- Lorna. - I was driving this way anyway.
- No. You're checking up. - Says who?
You look good. I have always loved this one.
translation.es: Te ves bien. Siempre me gustó este.

translation.en: What are you doing here?
This could be a very big deal.
She's the presiding judge. So I came down to gather intel.
translation.es: Es la jueza presidenta. Vine a buscar información.

translation.en: And?
Most of her work is administrative, which judge goes where and so forth.
translation.es: Su trabajo es administrativo, decide dónde va cada juez.

translation.en: And?
And… she assigns cases.
- If that's what this is about… - You don't want me to blow it.
translation.es: - Si se trata de eso… - No quieres que lo arruine.

translation.en: I'm just saying, whatever this is, it has to go well. Okay?
translation.es: Solo digo que, sea lo que sea, te tiene que ir bien. ¿Sí?

translation.en: Mr. Haller, I presume.
Judge Holder.
I don't believe we've met before.
No, Your Honor.
Well, come on then.
The Lincoln Lawyer, that what they call you?
translation.es: El abogado del Lincoln. ¿Así lo llaman?

translation.en: Some do, yes.
Or did.
Why?
Mainly worked out of my car. Going from court to court.
translation.es: Trabajaba mucho en mi auto. Iba de tribunal a tribunal.

translation.en: All the driving and so forth.
Being ready to flee the jurisdiction if need be.
translation.es: Fuera de la jurisdicción, de ser necesario.

translation.en: Never fled the jurisdiction.
Have a seat.
What's your relationship with Jerry Vincent?
translation.es: ¿Cuál es su relación con Jerry Vincent?

translation.en: Jerry Vincent?
Uh, I used to go up against him back when he was a prosecutor.
translation.es: Lo enfrenté varias veces cuando él era fiscal.

translation.en: And he switched sides.
He was murdered last night.
Excuse me?
Shot dead in his car.
What?
If you were close, please accept my condolences,
translation.es: Si era su amigo, le doy mis condolencias,

translation.en: but that's not why you're here.
translation.es: pero no lo llamé por eso.

translation.en: Were you close?
I mean, friendly. Colleagues, mostly.
He left you his practice.
I beg your pardon?
Mr. Vincent filed a motion with the court ten days ago
translation.es: El señor Vincent presentó una moción hace diez días

translation.en: that allowed for the transfer of his entire practice to you,
translation.es: para que todos sus clientes le sean transferidos a usted,

translation.en: should he become incapacitated or deceased.
translation.es: en caso de incapacidad o fallecimiento.

translation.en: - He never discussed this with you? - No.
Well, last night he became deceased, which means what was his is now yours.
translation.es: Anoche falleció, así que los clientes ahora son suyos.

translation.en: Including the Trevor Elliott trial.
You have heard of that?
The tech guy who killed his wife and her boyfriend.
translation.es: El tecnológico que mató a su esposa y el amante.

translation.en: Allegedly.
Of course.
That's now my case?
They're all your cases, Mr. Haller.
translation.es: Todos los casos son suyos, señor Haller.

translation.en: You might not get to keep them.
Every client has a right to move on to another attorney
translation.es: Cada cliente tiene derecho a cambiar de abogado

translation.en: once apprised of Mr. Vincent's demise.
translation.es: por el fallecimiento del señor Vincent.

translation.en: What it does mean is you get first shot.
translation.es: Pero usted es la primera opción.

translation.en: Assuming I'm satisfied that Mr. Vincent's clients
translation.es: Siempre que yo considere que estos clientes

translation.en: are being transferred to a replacement counsel
translation.es: son transferidos a un abogado remplazante

translation.en: of good standing and competent skill.
As far as I can tell,
you haven't had any cases in quite some time.
translation.es: usted no ejerce desde hace un tiempo.

translation.en: Yeah.  I was in an accident about 18 months ago.
translation.es: Sí. Tuve un accidente hace unos 18 meses.

translation.en: Surfing, if you can believe it.
I had multiple surgeries and, well, there were complications.
translation.es: Tuve varias cirugías, y hubo complicaciones.

translation.en: Complications?
I took painkillers. Got addicted to 'em. But that's over now. I got help.
translation.es: Tomé analgésicos. Me hice adicto. Pero ya terminó. Recibí ayuda.

translation.en: Got clean. So whatever concerns you may have about my reputation, I--
translation.es: Me rehabilité. Así que si la preocupa mi reputación…

translation.en: It's my reputation I'm concerned about. I'm the one that has to sign off on you.
translation.es: Me preocupa mi reputación. Yo debo aprobar todo esto.

translation.en: Or not.
Why you?
Of all the lawyers out there.
Honestly, Your Honor, I have no idea.
Well, if you were to guess?
Well, as I said, Jerry and I were friendly,
translation.es: Jerry y yo nos llevábamos bien,

translation.en: we trusted each other.
And second, though this is subjective,
when I am right, there's no better criminal defense attorney in Los Angeles
translation.es: cuando estoy bien, soy el mejor abogado defensor de Los Ángeles,

translation.en: and Jerry knew that from personal experience.
translation.es: y Jerry lo sabía por experiencia personal.

translation.en: And you think you're right now?
I do.
This is an order
transferring Mr. Vincent's practice to you.
translation.es: que le transfiere los casos del señor Vincent.

translation.en: I can rescind it just as fast.
translation.es: Puedo rescindirla con la misma facilidad.

translation.en: I will be monitoring you, Mr. Haller.
I want an updated inventory of cases by the beginning of next week.
translation.es: Quiero una lista de casos a principios de la semana próxima.

translation.en: After that, a bi- weekly status update
of every case on which you will remain counsel.
translation.es: de todos los casos en los que siga trabajando.

translation.en: - Am I clear? - I won't let you down, Your Honor.
Don't let your clients down.
I suggest you get to Mr. Vincent's office right now.
translation.es: Le sugiero que vaya ahora a la oficina del señor Vincent.

translation.en: The police are, no doubt, searching it
and probably invading their privacy as we speak.
translation.es: invadiendo la privacidad de los clientes.

translation.en: Thank you, Your Honor.
Good luck, Mr. Haller.
Well, did you get a case?
I just got a lot of them.
Including Trevor Elliott.
What?
I need to meet the clients,
get their sign- offs, but I might be back, Lorna.
translation.es: necesito su aprobación, pero podría ser mi regreso.

translation.en: I might actually be back.
What did I tell you about positive visualization?
translation.es: ¿Qué te dije de la visualización positiva?

translation.en: You wake up, not a single client.
Now, you are repping a guy like Trevor Elliott in a murder trial.
translation.es: Ahora, representas a Trevor Elliott en un juicio por asesinato.

translation.en: If he decides to keep me.
Positive thinking, Mickey. Positive thinking.
- Floor is closed, folks. - We have business on this floor.
translation.es: - Está clausurado. - Tenemos asuntos en este piso.

translation.en: - Not today, you don't. - Talk to the judge.
translation.es: - Hoy no. - Hable con la jueza.

translation.en: Need to see some ID.
You know, you don't help yourselves being dicky- do's.
translation.es: No les sirve de nada portarse como idiotas.

translation.en: Just saying.
- Can I help you? - Mickey Haller. I'm an attorney.
I've taken over Mr. Vincent's practice.
translation.es: Tomaré los clientes del señor Vincent.

translation.en: You need to come back tomorrow. This is a crime scene. It's sealed off.
translation.es: Regrese mañana. Es la escena de un crimen. Está clausurada.

translation.en: The crime scene was a parking garage, not this office.
translation.es: El crimen fue en un estacionamiento, no en esta oficina.

translation.en: There are client files here I need to access and apparently safeguard.
translation.es: Aquí hay archivos de clientes que debo revisar y proteger.

translation.en: What'd you say your name was?
Mickey Haller. This is Lorna Crane. She works with me.
translation.es: Mickey Haller. Y Lorna Crane. Trabaja conmigo.

translation.en: Well, Mickey Haller and Lorna Crane,
translation.es: Bien, Mickey Haller y Lorna Crane,

translation.en: I need you to both leave. Now.
- Dicky- do's, I'm telling you. - What was that?
That wasn't meant for you. But if you heard me, you heard me.
translation.es: No era para usted. Pero si lo escuchó, lo escuchó.

translation.en: You're contaminating a crime scene. You can't be here.
translation.es: Contaminan la escena. No pueden estar aquí.

translation.en: This order will confirm I've been appointed
translation.es: Esta orden confirma que fui asignado

translation.en: by the presiding judge of the Superior Court
translation.es: por la jueza presidenta del tribunal superior

translation.en: as replacement counsel to Jerry Vincent's clients.
translation.es: como abogado de los clientes de Vincent.

translation.en: That means his cases are now my cases,
translation.es: Significa que sus casos ahora son míos,

translation.en: and you have no right to be in here looking through files.
translation.es: y no tiene derecho a revisar los archivos.

translation.en: That's attorney- client privilege.
Mr. Vincent's been murdered. The motive could be in one of these files.
translation.es: Lo asesinaron. El motivo podría estar en los archivos.

translation.en: - Even if that were the case-- - Counselor--
Just read the order, Detective.
Your crime scene is out in the garage
translation.es: Su escena del crimen es un garaje,

translation.en: and no judge in LA would extend it to this office and these files.
translation.es: y ningún juez permitirá que revise los archivos.

translation.en: You say this gives you all of Mr. Vincent's cases?
translation.es: ¿Le dieron todos los casos del señor Vincent?

translation.en: That's right.
- Then that puts you on our list. - Come again.
Our suspect list.
He's dead and you get the whole business?
That's motive, ask me.
Care to tell us where you were last night between 8:00 and midnight?
translation.es: ¿Dónde estuvo anoche, entre las 8:00 y la medianoche?

translation.en: You got me, Detective. You got me.
I killed Jerry. Case closed, everybody.
translation.es: Yo maté a Jerry. Caso cerrado, chicos.

translation.en: Clearly you've done this before.
Are you gonna get out of here, or do I need to call the judge?
translation.es: ¿Va a irse ahora? ¿O tengo que llamar a la jueza?

translation.en: Yeah.
- Guys. - Nice to meet you, too.
- Bye. - Let's go.
Leave everything.
What?
All right. Come on.
Sometimes I think they teach it in the academy,
translation.es: A veces pienso que les enseñan en la academia

translation.en: how to piss people off.
When you think of all the bad blood between the people and police,
translation.es: Con el antagonismo que hay aquí entre la gente y la policía,

translation.en: you'd think how not to piss people off would be in the curriculum.
translation.es: deberían incluir en el programa cómo no irritar a la gente.

translation.en: How would you feel about me hiring Cisco?
He's a good investigator. One of the best I've worked with.
translation.es: Es un buen investigador. Uno de los mejores.

translation.en: Working with your ex- wife is one thing,
hiring her boyfriend is pushing it, even for you.
translation.es: Contratar a su novio es excesivo, hasta para ti.

translation.en: If Trevor Elliott decides to keep me,
I'm gonna need to move fast
with an investigator I can trust, and Cisco--
Yeah, Mickey Haller.
Yes, sir. 2:00 p.m. As in 2:00 p.m. today?
translation.es: Sí, señor. ¿A las 2:00 p. m. de hoy?

translation.en: Yes, sir, I'll be there. Thank you.
Who was that?
It's Judge Canter's clerk. It seems Jerry has a trial today.
translation.es: El secretario del juez Canter. Jerry tenía un juicio hoy.

translation.en: - What? - Yep.
- Are you gonna eat your sandwich? - No, Lorna, you can have it.
translation.es: - ¿Vas a comerte el sándwich? - No, Lorna. Cómetelo.

translation.en: Thank you. Run.
Hey.
- I'm covering for Jerry Vincent. - Oh, I heard.
translation.es: - Remplazo a Jerry Vincent. - Me enteré.

translation.en: Sorry. What's the name?
And your client's name?
Right.
It's, uh… Letts, first name Izzy.
I think it's a theft.
That would be Marc Daniels,
who I'm covering for, so that's actually mine.
translation.es: a quien remplazo, así que es mío.

translation.en: - Grand theft, by the by. - Obviously I'm gonna need a continuance.
translation.es: - Hurto mayor. - Obviamente, necesitaré una prórroga.

translation.en: Obviously I'm not gonna give it to you.
- What? - I got out- of- town witnesses.
translation.es: - ¿Qué? - Los testigos vienen de otra ciudad.

translation.en: I'd rather they be pissed off with the judge or you than me,
translation.es: Que se enojen con el juez o contigo, no conmigo,

translation.en: especially if I wanna get them back.
LA- 292587. People vs. Izzy Letts.
translation.es: LA-292587. El estado contra Izzy Letts.

translation.en: And we're on.
Sarah Shepard for the People, Judge. Ready for trial.
translation.es: Sarah Shepard por la fiscalía. Lista para el juicio.

translation.en: Mickey Haller for the defendant, Your Honor.
translation.es: Mickey Haller por la defensa, señoría.

translation.en: I'll be with you in one second. May I approach?
Your Honor, Mr. Vincent unexpectedly passed yesterday.
translation.es: Señoría, el señor Vincent falleció ayer.

translation.en: I'm filing in.
My sincere condolences. When will you be ready?
- Well… - Don't be greedy.
It's a bench trial with two witnesses.
translation.es: Es un juicio rápido con dos testigos.

translation.en: Out- of- town witnesses, who I'll lose with a continuance.
translation.es: De otra ciudad, podrían irse si lo posponemos.

translation.en: How's tomorrow?
Tomorrow?
Look at the file.
If you feel like you can't be ready, let me know.
translation.es: Si cree que no alcanza el tiempo, avíseme.

translation.en: Step back.
This case is continued until tomorrow, 10:00 a.m.
translation.es: El caso se pospone hasta mañana a las 10:00 a. m.

translation.en: - Wait, what? - Sir?
Your Honor, we flew down here from San Francisco.
- This is not fair. - I'm afraid we have an emergency.
translation.es: - No es justo. - Tenemos una emergencia.

translation.en: What about the victims? We had an emergency.
translation.es: ¿Y las víctimas? Nosotros tuvimos la emergencia.

translation.en: My wife was attacked, for God's sake.
translation.es: Atacaron a mi esposa, por Dios.

translation.en: She had her necklace violently snatched off her person.
translation.es: Le arrancaron el collar con mucha violencia.

translation.en: And the court is sympathetic, but it's unavoidable.
translation.es: Y el tribunal lo comprende, pero esto es inevitable.

translation.en: This case is pushed over until tomorrow at 10:00 a.m.
translation.es: El caso se pospone hasta mañana a las 10:00 a. m.

translation.en: Victims have no rights in this process.
- Yeah. Excuse me. - That's what she stole?
translation.es: - Sí. Disculpe. - ¿Eso es lo que robó?

translation.en: At least your client has taste.
- Mickey Haller. I'm your attorney. - Where's Jerry?
translation.es: - Mickey Haller. Soy tu abogado. - ¿Y Jerry?

translation.en: Why don't we go someplace we can talk?
translation.es: ¿Podemos ir a hablar a algún lado?

translation.en: He was such a nice man.
He wasn't even charging me.
At least, not yet.
Why would somebody kill him?
I don't know. The police are still gathering evidence.
translation.es: No sé. La policía aún busca pruebas.

translation.en: What kind of world is this?
I got to be ready on your case by tomorrow.
translation.es: Tengo que preparar tu caso para mañana.

translation.en: - So anything-- - I did not attack her.
translation.es: - Así que lo que sea… - No la ataqué.

translation.en: I snatched the necklace and ran. I did not attack her.
translation.es: Le saqué el collar y corrí. No la ataqué.

translation.en: Okay. And is there a reason Jerry didn't try to plead this?
translation.es: Bien. ¿Y por qué Jerry no intentó hacer un trato?

translation.en: 'Cause they wanted two years. And Jerry said it was excessive.
translation.es: Porque ofrecían dos años. Jerry dijo que era excesivo.

translation.en: He thought with a trial, I could at least impress the judge
translation.es: Pensó que, en un juicio, yo podría impresionar al juez

translation.en: with my extenuating circumstances.
Which are?
I'm a good person. Who had a drug problem.
translation.es: Soy una buena persona. Con un problema de drogas.

translation.en: It wasn't me who stole that necklace,
translation.es: No fui yo quien robó el collar,

translation.en: so much as somebody I don't even recognize.
translation.es: sino alguien a quien ni siquiera reconozco.

translation.en: Somebody who's gone.
I went through rehab.
I'm in recovery.
I believe you.
But I don't know if that other person's ever really gone.
translation.es: Pero no sé si esa persona desaparece del todo.

translation.en: Mine was oxy.
You?
Same, basically.
Heroin.
Which I switched to when I couldn't afford the oxy anymore.
translation.es: A la que pasé cuando ya no pude pagar la oxicodona.

translation.en: So, Jerry planned to put you up there?
And introduce my good personhood status into evidence.
translation.es: Presentaría como prueba mi estado de buena persona.

translation.en: The trial is tomorrow, you say?
Bench trial, two witnesses. I think I'm good.
translation.es: Sin jurado, dos testigos. Puedo hacerlo.

translation.en: Call Marvin Beedleman, tell him I need a favor.
translation.es: Llama a Marvin Beedleman, necesito un favor.

translation.en: He's pushing 80, you might have to remind him he owes me.
translation.es: Tiene casi 80, tendrás que recordarle que me debe una.

translation.en: Got anything on Trevor Elliott?
Jerry took a retainer of $625,000, most of which seems to be gone.
translation.es: Jerry cobró un adelanto de $625 000, que parece haber gastado.

translation.en: He's due another 450 at trial. Non- refundable.
translation.es: Debe pagar otros $450 000 en el juicio. No reembolsable.

translation.en: - Wow. - I know. It's like a year's worth of DUIs.
translation.es: Es un año de casos de ebriedad al volante.

translation.en: It's a franchise case.
- Who's the judge? - James P. Stanton.
He's an ex- defense attorney, so that's good. Are you almost there?
translation.es: Fue abogado defensor, eso es bueno. ¿Ya casi llegas?

translation.en: - Your appointment's at 3:00. - I'm pulling up.
translation.es: - Tu cita es a las 3:00. - Estoy estacionando.

translation.en: Do we know for sure Elliott hasn't already hired another lawyer?
translation.es: ¿Sabemos si Elliott no contrató ya a otro abogado?

translation.en: Don't worry about any other lawyer. Just go.
translation.es: No te preocupes por los demás. Ve.

translation.en: All right.
Hey.
Your name?
Nice car, man.
Thanks.
- Thank you. - I got it.
Mr. Haller.
Go right up. He's waiting for you.
Sure you don't need anything? Water…
translation.es: NOCTURNA EL LEGADO ¿No necesita nada? Agua…

translation.en: I'm fine. Thank you.
Mr. Elliott's in his office?
His office?  No.
Mr. Elliott.
Mickey Haller. How you doing?
Mr. Elliott?
I stand trial for murder next week.
translation.es: Me juzgarán la semana que viene.

translation.en: My attorney's just been shot dead.
translation.es: Acaban de matar a mi abogado.

translation.en: You can probably imagine how I might be doing.
Do they know anything? Any suspects?
Not to my knowledge, no.
I'm told they wanna interview all of his clients.
Obviously, I wouldn't advise you talk to them
while this other matter is pending.
What, are they gonna charge me with killing Jerry too?
translation.es: ¿Me acusarán también de matar a Jerry?

translation.en: Why not? It's open fucking season.
translation.es: ¿Por qué no? Es temporada de caza.

translation.en: So, who are you? How come I've never heard of you?
translation.es: ¿Y usted? ¿Por qué nunca lo oí nombrar?

translation.en: You've never heard of me
because I make it a practice not to be heard of.
translation.es: porque me dedico a que no me conozcan.

translation.en: Celebrity lawyers bring too much attention to their clients.
translation.es: Los abogados famosos atraen demasiada atención.

translation.en: I don't operate that way.
Now as my case manager explained, Jerry transferred his practice to me.
translation.es: Como le explicó mi asistente, Jerry me transfirió sus clientes.

translation.en: If you look at the contract of representation you signed with him,
translation.es: En el contrato de representación que firmó con él,

translation.en: you'll see it allowed Jerry to discuss your case with me.
translation.es: Jerry tiene permitido comentar su caso conmigo.

translation.en: Did he? Discuss it with you?
No. The point I'm making, Jerry trusted me.
translation.es: No. Pero Jerry confiaba en mí.

translation.en: It doesn't mean I have to.
No, it does not.
- It's Mickey, is it? - That's right.
You play any basketball, Mickey?
- A little bit. - I don't.
Not really.
I love to watch though.
But it always drove me crazy
seeing great players struggle with free throws.
translation.es: ver a los grandes jugadores fallar los tiros libres.

translation.en: It's the one thing you can control. Every shot, exactly the same.
translation.es: Lo único que se puede controlar. Cada tiro es exactamente igual.

translation.en: Take your time, line it up.
And yet, time and chance happen to them all.
translation.es: Y, sin embargo, puede salir mal.

translation.en: I don't mean to be an asshole.
Or maybe I do. We were set to go to trial next week.
translation.es: O quizás sí. Iremos a juicio la semana que viene.

translation.en: I've been waiting five months to clear my name.
translation.es: Llevo cinco meses esperando limpiar mi nombre.

translation.en: - I understand. - Do you?
You understand what it's like for an innocent man
translation.es: ¿Entiendes cómo es para un hombre inocente

translation.en: to have to wait and wait to have his day in court?
translation.es: tener que esperar y esperar para tener su juicio?

translation.en: To have to read all the lies and the bullshit in the media,
translation.es: ¿Tener que leer las mentiras de los medios,

translation.en: to have to wear a fucking ankle bracelet 24/7.
translation.es: tener que usar una tobillera las 24 horas?

translation.en: - You understand all of that? - I've dealt with clients wrongly accused.
translation.es: - ¿Entiendes todo eso? - Tuve clientes acusados injustamente.

translation.en: Do not handle me.
Okay. I'll get right to the punchline then.
translation.es: Bien. Pasaré a la frase final.

translation.en: Jerry Vincent was an excellent attorney.
- I'm better. - So you say.
translation.es: - Yo soy mejor. - Lo dices tú.

translation.en: - So would say Jerry. - Maybe. If he were here, which he is not.
translation.es: - También lo diría Jerry. - Quizás. Pero no está aquí.

translation.en: - I get your frustration. - I asked you not to handle me.
translation.es: - Entiendo su frustración. - Te pedí que no me manipularas.

translation.en: Before I consider you, I need to know you'd be ready next week,
translation.es: Necesito saber si estarás listo la semana próxima,

translation.en: 'cause I am not pushing this.
Not for another week. Not for another fucking day.
translation.es: Ni otra semana. Ni un día más.

translation.en: - I could be ready. - You're up to speed on the case?
translation.es: - Puedo estar listo. - ¿Estás al tanto de todo?

translation.en: I will be. If I'm not prepared, I'll tell you.
translation.es: Estaré. Si no estoy listo, se lo diré.

translation.en: But I'm confident you won't have to delay the trial.
translation.es: Pero confío en no tener que posponerlo.

translation.en: You're confident you have to tell me that to get the job.
translation.es: Confías en que debes decir eso para tener el trabajo.

translation.en: All right.
I need to think about this.
That's a good idea. Have me checked out.
Take your time. Not too much.
The longer you wait,
the greater the chance the judge will push your trial back.
translation.es: es más probable que el juez posponga el juicio.

translation.en: If you go with me, I'll make sure that won't happen.
translation.es: Si me contrata, me aseguraré de que no pase.

translation.en: Your sales skills are admirable, I'll give you that.
translation.es: Eres un vendedor admirable, lo admito.

translation.en: Criminal defense is what I do, Mr. Elliott.
translation.es: Lo mío es la defensa penal, señor Elliott.

translation.en: I do it very well. You have my numbers.
translation.es: Lo hago muy bien. Tiene mis números.

translation.en: I've lost everything, you understand that, Mickey?
My life, my reputation…
worst of all, my wife.
translation.es: Lo peor de todo, mi esposa.

translation.en: Who I very much did love.
I get it.
You get nothing. Not yet.
You think you just hit the lottery, but I'm telling you… not yet.
translation.es: Crees que te sacaste la lotería, pero te digo… Todavía no.

translation.en: Next week? That is impossible.
It was a deal- breaker.
translation.es: Era eso o nada, me di cuenta.

translation.en: First, let's land him,
then maybe I can talk him into a continuance.
translation.es: luego quizás lo convenza de posponerlo.

translation.en: That has to go.
- What? - Nothing.
translation.es: SI MANTUVIESE LA BOCA CERRADA, NO ESTARÍA AQUÍ. - ¿Qué? - Nada.

translation.en: I'm gonna need a driver.
I need this time to be going over files.
translation.es: Necesito tiempo para revisar los archivos.

translation.en: I was thinking maybe Quintero. Is he around?
Still doing time in Corcoran, I heard.
Well, what about Stevie?
Stevie is a terrible driver. Nobody's getting in the car with him.
translation.es: Stevie conduce pésimo. Nadie se sube al auto con él.

translation.en: All right. Put the word out, will ya?
I'm pulling in. See you in a second.
Jesus. You scared the shit out of me, Cisco.
translation.es: Cielos. Casi me matas de un susto, Cisco.

translation.en: What the hell are you even doing here, man?
Lorna said you wanted to hire me.
Not for this, Cisco. To work on the Trevor Elliott case.
translation.es: No para esto. Para el caso de Trevor Elliott.

translation.en: The police'll handle who killed Jerry Vincent.
translation.es: La policía resolverá lo de Jerry.

translation.en: You're giving me a heart attack, man.
translation.es: Me vas a dar un infarto, amigo.

translation.en: You could have given me one.
translation.es: Tú pudiste darme uno a mí.

translation.en: Sorry.
So, Trevor Elliott, huh? That's a big get.
translation.es: Así que Trevor Elliott. Es un caso grande.

translation.en: Yeah, if I get him.
I haven't nailed down the gig.
I need to be able to tell him something good.
translation.es: Tengo que poder decirle algo bueno.

translation.en: Something to make him wanna hire me.
translation.es: Algo que haga que quiera contratarme.

translation.en: Have you seen the file?
Some. Two dead people. He was at the scene. Not exactly stellar.
translation.es: Un poco. Dos muertos. Él estaba presente. Nada estelar.

translation.en: Yeah, well, I gotta offer stellar somehow.
Maybe Maggie can give us some inside baseball on the State's case.
translation.es: Quizás Maggie pueda darnos información de la fiscalía.

translation.en: Oh, shit. Maggie.
Damn it.
You can go, Mom. I'll be fine till he gets here.
translation.es: Vete, mamá. Estaré bien hasta que llegue.

translation.en: I'm not going.
Think I'm okay to be by myself for a half- hour.
translation.es: Estaré bien sola por media hora.

translation.en: The world hasn't gotten that dangerous.
translation.es: El mundo no se puso tan peligroso.

translation.en: - Not happening. - I'm hoping to have a nice time tonight.
translation.es: - No pasará. - Quiero pasarla bien hoy.

translation.en: My chances are better if Dad's in a good mood,
translation.es: Eso pasará si papá está de buen humor,

translation.en: and the chances of that are better
translation.es: y es más probable que ocurra

translation.en: if you don't rip him a new one for being 15 minutes late.
translation.es: si no lo regañas por llegar 15 minutos tarde.

translation.en: There he is.
- I'm sorry. - Really?
Hi, Dad.
Sorry.
Sorry, Mags.
- You look good. Sorry. - You gave me your word. 6:00 p.m.
translation.es: - Te ves bien. Lo siento. - Lo prometiste. A las 6:00.

translation.en: I know.
You really wanna get back to joint custody? Step one--
Maggie, I'm here now.
How about we deal with you and me later, all right?
- I'll pick you up in the morning. - Okay.
translation.es: - Iré por ti en la mañana. - Bien.

translation.en: - I love you. - Love you, too.
Hey.
If you're gonna treat me like shit,
translation.es: Si vas a tratarme como basura,

translation.en: have the decency to not look so amazing while doing it.
translation.es: ten la decencia de no lucir tan fabulosa.

translation.en: Hello.
- How are you, baby? You good? - I'm good.
- Ready? Have your bag? - Yeah.
He had a sense what was coming, Jerry.
translation.es: Jerry sabía lo que se le venía.

translation.en: I don't know.
Well, he files a motion ten days ago.
translation.es: Presentó la moción hace diez días.

translation.en: Transfer his practice in case of his death.
translation.es: Para transferir sus clientes si moría.

translation.en: Look, let's just focus on Elliott for now, okay?
Mickey's not really serious about trying this case next week, is he?
translation.es: Mickey no habla en serio de ir a juicio en una semana, ¿no?

translation.en: Technically, it's nine days. Okay, I said the same thing,
translation.es: Técnicamente, son nueve días. Sí, yo dije lo mismo,

translation.en: but cases like this don't come around often.
translation.es: pero los casos como este no son frecuentes.

translation.en: And Mickey needs this. He needs something.
translation.es: Y Mickey lo necesita. Necesita algo.

translation.en: He's okay with… You know?
translation.es: ¿Le parece bien lo de…? Ya sabes.

translation.en: - I take it you haven't told him. - I just haven't found the right moment.
translation.es: - No se lo dijiste. - No encontré el momento adecuado.

translation.en: So, you didn't actually go in the water?
You know that nightmare I have?
It's not so much of me almost drowning,
translation.es: No se trata tanto de que casi me ahogo,

translation.en: it's of you.
Leaving you behind, that's the part that always gets me.
translation.es: Dejarte es la parte que más me afecta.

translation.en: - Dad… - What?
You had an accident.
You're not the first surfer it's happened to
translation.es: No eres el primer surfista al que le pasa

translation.en: and I'm not the first kid to have something bad happen to a parent.
translation.es: ni yo soy la primera hija a cuyo padre le pasa algo.

translation.en: You are tough. You are tough.
Don't get quite as tough as her, okay?
translation.es: No seas tan dura como ella, ¿sí?

translation.en: - I'll try not to. - Well, good.
She's worried about you.
She said that?
She thinks it might be some mid- life thing on top of the pills.
translation.es: Cree que, además de las pastillas, tienes una crisis de la edad.

translation.en: Is it?
Well, maybe a little.
What do you mean?
Mija, two failed marriages, busted law practice,
translation.es: Dos matrimonios fallidos, una carrera arruinada,

translation.en: six months in rehab…
You hit the jackpot with your daughter. Come on…
translation.es: Te sacaste la lotería con tu hija.

translation.en: Hey.
When I look back, I always wanted to be a defense lawyer,
ever since I was a kid watching my dad.
translation.es: desde que era niño y veía a mi papá.

translation.en: The stuff they teach you in law school, how the system's supposed to work.
translation.es: Las cosas que te enseñan en la facultad, cómo debe funcionar el sistema.

translation.en: You get out there and it's all just muddy.
Everybody's working an angle.
Everybody lies.
After a while you wonder if you're doing any good at all.
translation.es: Con el tiempo, te preguntas si estás haciendo algún bien.

translation.en: You know Mom never feels that way, right? She just puts bad people away.
translation.es: Mamá nunca siente eso. Simplemente, encierra a los malos.

translation.en: Your mom's a true believer.
That's what makes her so great at what she does.
translation.es: Por eso es genial en lo que hace.

translation.en: But you're not?
I was. I think I still am.
translation.es: Lo era. Creo que aún lo soy.

translation.en: Look, I believe that in our system, everyone is innocent until proven guilty.
translation.es: En nuestro sistema, todos son inocentes hasta que se demuestre su culpabilidad.

translation.en: Now, when the State points the finger at you,
translation.es: Pero cuando el estado te apunta con el dedo,

translation.en: well, I'm all you got.
Now what?
Are you kidding me?
Sorry to intrude.
This better be good, Detective.
It's important.
We really gotta see Jerry Vincent's files.
translation.es: Tenemos que ver los archivos de Jerry Vincent.

translation.en: I realize you have attorney- client privilege.
DA says you probably have the right to shut us down.
translation.es: El fiscal dice que puede negarse.

translation.en: Seriously? I knew this guy.
translation.es: ¿En serio? Yo conocía a este tipo.

translation.en: I really need you to see what we're up against.
translation.es: Necesito que vea lo que enfrentamos.

translation.en: It's a kill shot to the head, very clean.
translation.es: Un tiro en la cabeza, muy limpio.

translation.en: Whoever pulled the trigger picked up the shell casings too.
translation.es: Quien le disparó recogió los casquillos.

translation.en: Someone targeted Jerry Vincent
and they didn't take his wallet or his cash.
translation.es: y no se llevó la billetera ni el dinero.

translation.en: They took his bag with his laptop.
translation.es: Se llevaron su bolso y su laptop.

translation.en: Now, the question is, what was on there? What did he know that got him killed?
translation.es: La pregunta es: ¿qué había ahí? ¿Qué sabía para que lo mataran?

translation.en: If the answer's any place, it's probably in his files.
translation.es: Si hay una respuesta, debe estar en sus archivos.

translation.en: I wish I could help you, Detective, I really do.
I'm asking you to help yourself.
translation.es: Le pido que se ayude a usted mismo.

translation.en: You're at risk, Counselor.
You could be next.
Was Jerry involved with wise guys or cartel guys?
translation.es: ¿Jerry estaba involucrado con mafias o cárteles?

translation.en: I doubt it, he was straight ahead.
- Ex- prosecutor. - Maybe it's someone he put in prison.
translation.es: - Exfiscal. - Quizás alguien que mandó a prisión.

translation.en: One second.
Yeah, I thought about that. Comb through the files.
translation.es: Sí, eso pensé. Revisa los archivos.

translation.en: Look for any hint of threats, clients, ex- clients, everybody, all right?
translation.es: Busca cualquier indicio de amenazas, clientes, exclientes, todos.

translation.en: I'm on it.
In the meantime, Elliott gave us access
translation.es: Mientras tanto, Elliott nos dio acceso

translation.en: to his house in Malibu where the murders happened.
translation.es: a la casa de Malibú donde pasó todo.

translation.en: It's important we get a true picture.
I'll shoot you the address. Let's meet there around noon.
translation.es: Te enviaré la dirección. Veámonos allí al mediodía.

translation.en: This means we have the case?
Not yet. The more we learn the better our chances.
translation.es: Todavía no. Cuanto más sepamos, mejor.

translation.en: - Where are you right now? - Heading into trial.
translation.es: - ¿Dónde estás ahora? - Entrando a un juicio.

translation.en: - Oh! Mickey! - Thanks for coming. I appreciate this.
Why wouldn't I?
When the greatest person I ever met asks for my help,
translation.es: Cuando la mejor persona que conozco me pide ayuda,

translation.en: I give my help.
How's Eleanor?
Oh, she's absolutely fantastic is how she is. And she sends her love.
Send my love to her. Thank you.  LA- 292587. People vs. Izzy Letts.
translation.es: - Envíale los míos. Gracias. - LA-292587. El estado contra Izzy Letts.

translation.en: Be with you in a second.
Mickey Haller, Judge, asks that we approach?
Please tell me you're ready.
- Almost, Judge. - Mr. Haller.
Actually, Judge.
At the risk of further antagonizing Mr. Holt,
translation.es: a riesgo de hacer enojar más al señor Holt,

translation.en: maybe we call him up for the sidebar?
- Excuse me? - What's going on?
A bit unorthodox, but in the best interests
translation.es: Es poco ortodoxo, pero es lo mejor

translation.en: of judicial economy and justice.
Take 30 seconds.
Mr. Holt.
Could you approach the bench?
How you doin'? All right, I'll make this quick.
My client is charged with grand theft.
Which under Section 487 of the Penal Code
translation.es: Según el artículo 487 del Código Penal,

translation.en: means the value of the stolen object exceeds $950.
translation.es: significa que el valor del objeto robado excede los $950.

translation.en: Your Honor, that necklace is worth what, $400, tops?
translation.es: Señoría, ese collar vale $400, como mucho.

translation.en: What?
I've taken few payments in diamonds and gold,
translation.es: Acepté pagos en diamantes y oro,

translation.en: developed a pretty good eye.
But to be sure, Judge,
I also brought with me an expert on the matter.
translation.es: también traje a un experto en el tema.

translation.en: That is Marvin Beedleman. He's a jeweler.
translation.es: Ese es Marvin Beedleman. Es joyero.

translation.en: He can give us a pretty quick appraisal.
The District Attorney might want to get one of her own.
translation.es: La fiscal quizás quiera traer a su propio tasador.

translation.en: Guessing your wife doesn't know it's a knock- off?
translation.es: ¿Su esposa no sabe que es una imitación?

translation.en: I, of course, don't want to upset her.
Are you kidding me?
I am not. I am not.
Even if it is a knock- off, the defendant thought she was stealing the real thing.
translation.es: Aunque fuese una réplica, la acusada creyó que robaba algo real.

translation.en: You have a witness to testify as to her state of mind?
translation.es: ¿Tiene un testigo de su estado mental?

translation.en: Did you not have the necklace appraised?
We have the appraisal from his insurance company.
translation.es: Tenemos la tasación de su aseguradora.

translation.en: Might open up a whole new can of fraud.
I could be wrong, of course.
Miss Shepard, any thoughts on how you might like to play this?
translation.es: Señorita Shepard, ¿cómo quiere seguir con esto?

translation.en: Completely dismissed? I get to just go?
Well, unless the DA decides to prosecute the Holts
translation.es: Sí, a menos que la fiscal quiera procesar a los Holt

translation.en: and you get called as a witness against them,
translation.es: y te llame como testigo en su contra,

translation.en: but I don't think that'll happen.
Oh, my God.
Didn't even have to get up there
and testify as to what a nice person you are.
translation.es: y decir lo buena persona que eres.

translation.en: I don't know how to thank you. I will pay you one day, I promise.
translation.es: No sé cómo agradecerle. Le pagaré algún día, lo prometo.

translation.en: You pay me now.
I'm broke. I don't have a nickel to my name.
Have a driver's license?
Excuse me?
What do you mean you hired her?
I told you I needed a driver, and she can drive.
translation.es: Necesitaba un chofer, y ella sabe conducir.

translation.en: I'm actually a good driver.
She's actually a good driver, Lorna.
It wouldn't kill you to work from an office.
translation.es: Podrías trabajar en una oficina. Demasiada estructura.

translation.en: Too much structure. I gotta work while I'm on the move.
translation.es: Demasiada estructura. Tengo que trabajar en movimiento.

translation.en: - Didn't you say she's an addict? - Former. Who am I to judge? Turn right.
translation.es: - ¿No era una adicta? - Ex. ¿Quién soy para juzgarla? Derecha.

translation.en: I'm almost there. Call you back.
Mickey, no--
- Maggie. - Hi, Lorna. Nice to see you.
translation.es: - Maggie. - Hola, Lorna. Me alegra verte.

translation.en: Um, thank you, and likewise. You look pretty.
translation.es: Gracias, e igualmente. Estás muy linda.

translation.en: Something I can help you with?
We both care for him, Lorna.
translation.es: Las dos nos preocupamos por él.

translation.en: And I mean, I'm happy
for all this positive turn of events for Mickey…
translation.es: todos estos cambios positivos para Mickey…

translation.en: But?
But taking over a high- profile murder for a lawyer who was just gunned down
translation.es: Pero tomar un caso de alto perfil de un abogado al que mataron

translation.en: for God knows what reason, do we really think this is a good idea?
translation.es: por Dios sabe qué razones, ¿de verdad es una buena idea?

translation.en: The wolf is at the door, Maggie.
I have been holding his practice together with string and glue.
translation.es: Mantengo este sitio en pie a duras penas.

translation.en: His life is bigger than just his law career.
translation.es: Su vida es más importante que su carrera.

translation.en: He needs to get back on his feet first. His daughter needs him back on his feet.
translation.es: Tiene que recuperarse primero. Su hija necesita que se recupere.

translation.en: I know, and this could be the thing that gets him there.
translation.es: Lo sé, y esto podría ayudarlo.

translation.en: For the first time in a year, he's alive again.
translation.es: Por primera vez en un año, volvió a vivir.

translation.en: And you know Mickey.
The only thing he likes more than a fight
translation.es: Lo único que le gusta más que pelear

translation.en: is a fight with one hand tied behind his back.
translation.es: es pelear con una mano atada en la espalda.

translation.en: I'll be about 15 minutes.
Sounds good.
Welcome to the jungle.
Remind me. We're never bringing the jury here.
They'll hate this guy and we're doomed.
translation.es: Van a odiarlo, y estaremos acabados.

translation.en: Wife was there on the bed.
translation.es: La esposa estaba ahí, en la cama.

translation.en: Boyfriend there on the floor.
Police think Elliott stood at the door. Maybe watching them fuck--
translation.es: La policía piensa que Elliott estuvo en la puerta, mirándolos coger…

translation.en: Fornicate for a while before he came in and shot 'em.
translation.es: Fornicar durante un rato, antes de entrar y dispararles.

translation.en: Murder weapon was never found.
Probably out there in the ocean.
I don't know, Mick. You're good, but this good?
translation.es: No sé, Mick. Eres bueno, pero ¿tan bueno?

translation.en: If they could place Elliott here.
Motive all over. Positive gunshot residue.
translation.es: El motivo es claro. Tenía residuos de pólvora.

translation.en: Has he given you his story?
Hey, listen, there's something else.
What?
I know you're okay with me seeing Lorna and shit.
translation.es: Sé que aceptas que salga con Lorna.

translation.en: At least you say you're okay with it.
translation.es: Al menos, dijiste que te parecía bien.

translation.en: Lorna's been meaning to tell you when the time is right,
translation.es: Lorna quería contártelo en el momento adecuado,

translation.en: but somehow,
I suspect the time might never be right for her,
translation.es: sospecho que ese momento nunca llegará para ella,

translation.en: so I'm just gonna say it.
Me and Lorna,
we're gonna get married.
What do you mean, Ah? What is Ah? Is it okay with you?
translation.es: ¿Cómo que ah? ¿Qué es ah? ¿Te parece bien?

translation.en: I'm not part of the equation, Cisco.
translation.es: No soy parte de la ecuación, Cisco.

translation.en: But I wanna know, is it okay with you?
Do you love her?
With all my heart.
Then it's all right with me.
But I'll tell you, Cisco.
She's one of the four most important people in my life.
translation.es: Es una de las cuatro personas que más me importan.

translation.en: - Should you ever hurt her-- - Of course I would never.
translation.es: - Si la lastimas… - Nunca haría eso.

translation.en: She's the greatest thing ever.
Who's the fourth?
What?
You said four people.
Hayley, Maggie, Lorna and--
Who's the fourth?
Yes, uh… Yes, I'll be there.
Trevor Elliott has summoned me.
You checked out well.
High- performing trial lawyer, much better than Jerry according to most.
translation.es: Abogado triunfador, mucho mejor que Jerry según la mayoría.

translation.en: Until you went off the deep end and became a drug addict.
translation.es: Hasta que te hundiste y te hiciste drogadicto.

translation.en: I'm not an addict now.
Listen, Mickey. The thing about this case,
translation.es: Mickey, el problema de este caso

translation.en: I need to win it in court
translation.es: es que necesito ganar el juicio

translation.en: and I need to win in the court of public opinion.
translation.es: y necesito ganarme a la opinión pública.

translation.en: The world is quick to cancel these days.
translation.es: En esta época, te cancelan rápido.

translation.en: Just take a look at my Twitter feed.
I need a lawyer who can get me my freedom back
translation.es: Necesito un abogado que recupere mi libertad

translation.en: and my name back.
Are you that lawyer?
No, all I can do is get you a Not guilty.
translation.es: Puedo lograr que te declaren no culpable.

translation.en: I can't deliver you a finding of innocent.
The courts don't work that way. Not guilty, best I can do.
translation.es: Los juicios no funcionan así. No culpable es lo máximo.

translation.en: And you can get that? For sure?
Depends on what I have to work with.
translation.es: Depende de lo que tenga para trabajar.

translation.en: - I didn't kill them. - I didn't ask you.
But I need you to know, I didn't.
translation.es: Pero necesito que sepas que no lo hice.

translation.en: All right, here's the deal, Trevor.
I can win almost any case as long as I know what I'm dealing with.
translation.es: Puedo ganar casi cualquier caso, mientras sepa qué tengo.

translation.en: Right now, I don't.
So you lie to me,
I don't want your case, however much I might need it.
translation.es: no quiero tu caso, por más que lo necesite.

translation.en: Okay.
Okay.
I was as far from cool as you can get in high school.
translation.es: En la secundaria, era el tipo menos popular.

translation.en: Girls wouldn't give me the time of day, but I could always talk to Zelda.
translation.es: Las chicas no me daban ni la hora, pero podía hablar con Zelda.

translation.en: Real life sucked.
translation.es: La vida real era un asco.

translation.en: But video games, they mattered.
translation.es: Pero los videojuegos eran lo mejor.

translation.en: Then I met Lara.
She was different. She was beautiful, she was brilliant.
And she loved me.
We're just out of grad school, the game industry was exploding.
translation.es: Al terminar nuestro posgrado, la industria estaba creciendo.

translation.en: But the problem that nobody could get around was the uncanny valley.
translation.es: Pero nadie podía solucionar el problema del valle inquietante.

translation.en: Uncanny what?
If you're trying to make something humanlike,
translation.es: Cuando haces algo parecido a un ser humano,

translation.en: the human brain will reject it unless it's almost perfect.
translation.es: el cerebro lo rechaza a menos que sea casi perfecto.

translation.en: You know, video game characters were close to real,
translation.es: Los personajes de los juegos parecían reales,

translation.en: but not close enough.
Especially in the eyes, the eyes always gave it away.
translation.es: En especial los ojos. Los ojos los traicionaban.

translation.en: But the closer the characters resemble us,
translation.es: Cuanto más se parecen a nosotros,

translation.en: the more connection we feel, the more we wanna play.
translation.es: más conexión sentimos, más queremos jugar.

translation.en: That's the uncanny valley. And I was the one who crossed it.
translation.es: Ese es el valle inquietante. Y yo lo crucé.

translation.en: Working out of my garage.
One script, maybe 100 lines of code,
translation.es: Un programa de unas 100 líneas de código

translation.en: changed everything.
The girl in the game.
That was our first big hit.
It's what put us on the map.
And, yes, I modeled the character after Lara.
translation.es: Y sí, basé su diseño en Lara.

translation.en: It's fair to say that her DNA
translation.es: Es justo decir que su ADN

translation.en: is in everything this company has ever done.
translation.es: está en todo lo que hizo esta empresa.

translation.en: We were a team.
I didn't know she was cheating on me.
Looking back at it, I was working all the time,
translation.es: Claro, yo trabajaba todo el tiempo,

translation.en: I was traveling too much, and she grew resentful.
translation.es: viajaba mucho, y se sintió resentida.

translation.en: Angry.
I went out to the house that day to surprise her.
translation.es: Ese día, fui a la casa a sorprenderla.

translation.en: And instead…
I will never get that out of my head as long as I live.
translation.es: Nunca podré quitarme esa imagen de la cabeza.

translation.en: I found her like that. My own wife. My best friend.
translation.es: La encontré así. Mi esposa. Mi mejor amiga.

translation.en: And that fucking yoga instructor.
translation.es: Y el maldito profesor de yoga.

translation.en: And everyone thinks I killed her,
translation.es: Y todos creen que la maté,

translation.en: but the truth is if I had found them alive,
translation.es: pero la verdad es que, de haber estado viva,

translation.en: I wouldn't even have left her.
I would have begged her to come back to me because I need her.
translation.es: Le habría rogado que regresara, porque la necesito.

translation.en: People say I'm a genius. The code I wrote, they call it magic.
translation.es: Todos dicen que soy un genio. Que lo que programé es magia.

translation.en: Lara was the magic. She was the inspiration.
translation.es: Lara era la magia. Era la inspiración.

translation.en: Without her, I would still be sitting in my garage.
translation.es: Sin ella, seguiría sentado en mi garaje.

translation.en: I never could have killed her
because without her…
I have no magic.
That's what you're dealing with. Can you work with that?
translation.es: Eso es lo que hay. ¿Puedes trabajar con eso?

translation.en: I can win with that.
- You can win with that? - I can.
- You can win with that next week? - I can.
Then you're hired.
- Well? - We got it.
- We got the case? - Lots of work to do, Lorna.
- We need to keep our heads. - Oh, my God.
translation.es: - No perdamos la cabeza. - Dios mío.

translation.en: Lots of work. Tell Cisco to meet me at the office.
translation.es: Mucho trabajo. Que Cisco vaya a la oficina.

translation.en: See you in a few.
You okay?
Your eyes look like they're about to cry.
Uh, just allergies.
Your eyes should be on the road, by the way.
translation.es: Y tú debes mirar el camino.

translation.en: You really okay?
Never been better. Take the turn up here, will you?
What? Is something wrong?
Yeah, we're being followed.
